Light + Fit

Incorporating self-care and wellness into your daily routines doesn’t have to be all or nothing. Light + Fit believes health deserves a lighter outlook! It is about what fits for you. Through this app, we want to bring feel-good experiences that help you focus on your wellness, while having fun along the way.

The new app will share easy to do at-home wellness videos, including workouts routines and mediations, along with movement reminders and WFH wellness tips throughout the workday. Messages will include reminders to drink water, tips on how to best organize your desk for productivity, and ways to communicate boundaries to friends and family when working remotely.

To create the content in this app, Light + Fit has partnered with Julianne Hough’s fitness platform Kinrgy and Movemeant Foundation
